attributes.action: Allow UKBA to be able to revoke ILR (once given) where it is discovered that the marriage was only for the purpose of gaining ILR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I like a number of other individuals have suffered from marrying a foreign national, bringing her to this country and awaiting for the granting of ILR - WHne my wife gained ILR she promptly left the family home and is now seeking a divorce. I asked UKBA if they could revoke theILR because it was obvious that's all the marriage was entered for (from her view) and was told that once given under these circumstances ILR couldn't be revoked.
